The claim was published on Facebook on N: 2020, and has been shared almost 500 times.
The post includes a photo of Jemima Gold: with an Urdu-language text overlay announcing the birth of a daughter.
The Facebook post links to a news articl: 7 Daily News Point with the same headline, which further supports the claim.
However: upon further investigation, it was found that the Urdu-language report linked in the Facebook post actually states that Jemima announced the birth of her niece on Instagram, not her own daughter. This raises doubts about the authenticity of the claim.
